roleset.name: slouch
roleset.note: SLOUCH-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin. Member of VNcls assuming_position-50, spatial_configuration-47.6, run-51.3.2. (from slouch.01-v)

roles.note: Use argA for causal agent if it occurs outside of the slouching entity.

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: I slouched in the chair with a hand on my forehead, looking at my lap.
example.arg: with a hand on my forehead

example.name: Causative Agent, Transitive
example.text: I slouched my tote bag on my shoulder.
